SmartSkin: A smartphone with a flexible, skin-like exterior that can be worn on the wrist like a watch, allowing users to receive notifications and control their phone without having to physically hold it.
ProjectorPhone: A smartphone with a built-in projector that allows users to project images and videos onto any surface, creating a large, immersive display.
BrainWave: A smartphone that can read and interpret brain waves, allowing users to control their phone with their thoughts.
InvisiblePhone: A smartphone that can change its appearance and transparency at will, allowing users to customize their phone to suit their mood or environment.
AirPhone: A smartphone that can be controlled using hand gestures in mid-air
